https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/duGboCtympSQBkkuKzvwQ4aAYRO.jpg Lene Thurner is standing on a train platform in Munich. She has to decide: back to Berlin where she lives, or toward the south, where at the foot of the Alps her family lives on the lonely farm “Hierankl”. A Birthday to Remember
